page.title: 05Uyeasound Beaches.
page.content: There are a few nice beaches in Uyeasound but there is a particularly attractive beach that I like in Muness.It is called Sand Wick. One sunny day in 1984 I went up on my cycle with my brother and had a walk on the beach.I went for a swim in the sea and made a sand castle.It is a sandy and clean beach. At dinner time Mum came up in the car and brought some sandwiches.When she saw we were safe and enjoying ourselves Mum went away. We played on the beach for a long time.We had play fights and pushed each other into the sea.We also buried each other in the sand.When we were bored we went home and had a bath and had tea.
